SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ViewData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewData
public class ViewData extends Object
The ViewData class represents the model, which contains all the datas needed for the view of the game. It contains information about players, game state, board, bookshelves, points, messages, and more.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • availableScores

      private Map<Integer,Integer> availableScores
      Map that associates each common goal with its available score.

    • messages

      private List<Triple<String,List<String>,String>> messages
      List of all messages. Each message is represented with a triplet. The triplet is formed, following the given order, by a string representing the sender's nickname, a list of strings representing the recipients' nickname and the text of the message

    • userInterface

      private UI userInterface
      The user interface associated.

    • exception

      private String exception
      Last thrown exception in the game

    • unreadMessages

      private boolean unreadMessages
      Boolean that id true if and only if there are some unread messages.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewData

      public ViewData(int BOARD_DIM, int BOOKSHELF_COL, int BOOKSHELF_ROW)
      Constructs a new ViewData object with the specified dimensions for the board and bookshelves.
      Parameters:
      BOARD_DIM - The dimension of the game square board.
      BOOKSHELF_COL - The number of columns in the bookshelves.
      BOOKSHELF_ROW - The number of rows in the bookshelves.
